onset.Description: Onset time of the first stimulus

duration.Description: Duration of trial from beginning of first stimulus to the begining of the next trial

trial_type.Description: Category of trial based on stimuli characteristics

stim_file.Description: Location and name of presented stimulus

correct.Description: Indicates the correct response for this trial

window1_response.Description: Indicates the response made by the participant during the first .75 seconds of the trial

window1_RT.Description: Subject response time measured from beginning of the trial until the beginning of window 2

window2_response.Description: Indicates the response made by the participant after the first .75 seconds of the trial until the beginning of the next trial

window2_RT.Description: Subject response time measured after the first .75 seconds of presentation of stimulus until the beginning of the next trial

calculated_response.Description: Indicates the calcuated response using the methods described in dataset/derivatives/func_mv_acc_rt/ELP_acc_rt_final_2020_12_18.doc

calculated_accuracy.Description: Indicates the response accuracy calculated using methods described in dataset/derivatives/func_mv_acc_rt/ELP_acc_rt_final_2020_12_18.doc

calculated_RT.Description: Indicates trial response time calculated using methods described in dataset/derivatives/func_mv_acc_rt/ELP_acc_rt_final_2020_12_18.doc
